nodes.text: 8D-J8 was an 8D-series smelter droid who worked in the restaurant Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, turning the spit that cooked meat under the podracer engine roaster in the middle of the restaurant.

The droid was programmed by Droid Depot proprietor Mubo for restaurant owner Bakkar, who later complained about 8D-J8's constant talking. Mubo suggested Bakkar try deactivating and reactivating the droid.
Sometime during 34 ABY, 8D-JD offered a Ronto Wrap to Remex Io, stating it was the best in the quadrant. Remex instead took the Meiloorun Juice which he said looked safer.
Prior to working on Batuu, 8D-J8 spent time on Tatooine with Jawas.

8D-J8 was announced as a character that would be present in the Ronto Roasters restaurant in the theme park land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened on May 31, 2019. Prior to the opening, a post on the official Disney Parks Blog erroneously referred to 8D-J8 as a "former settler droid" rather than a smelter droid.
